law.catch_line: In this Part XI of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this Part XI of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Family child care provider" means an individual who participates in the Maryland Child Care Subsidy Program who is:
a registered provider as defined in § 5-550(d) of this subtitle; or
exempt from the registration requirements under § 5-552(b) of this subtitle.

"Provider organization" means an organization that:
includes family child care providers; and
has as one of its purposes the representation of family child care providers in their relations with the State.
